__e: Why, where these kids come from, they hardly know what daylight is.
Well, if that's daylight and that's night, then we may as well assume that this is morning again.
And into the light of day, and that only works if he thinks the box is still out there.
So now he just shuts everybody out. It's a defense mechanism. That's not an excuse.
And I am personally going to see to it... that you never see the light of day again.
Who else has as much to lose as you if it ever gets out?
And whoever that is, there's something in this file he does not want to get out.
So now I just have to make sure that the book that chapter comes from never sees the light of day.
